title: Mounted harpoonfish

properties.name: description
properties.value: A mounted harpoonfish can be built in the Fishing trophy space of the Skill Hall in a player-owned house. It requires 66 Construction to build and when built, it gives 239 Construction and Fishing experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it.

Mounted harpoonfish

A mounted harpoonfish can be built in the Fishing trophy space of the Skill Hall in a player-owned house. It requires 66 Construction to build and when built, it gives 239 Construction and Fishing experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it.

Players must complete Priest in Peril to be able to stuff the big harpoonfish. If players remove the mounted fish, they will receive nothing back.

A '''mounted harpoonfish''' can be built in the [[Fishing trophy space]] of the [[Skill Hall]] in a [[player-owned house]]. It requires 66 [[Construction]] to build and when built, it gives 239 Construction and [[Fishing]] [[experience]]. The player must have a [[hammer]] and a [[saw]] in their inventory to build it.

Players must complete [[Priest in Peril]] to be able to [[Taxidermist|stuff]] the [[big harpoonfish]]. If players remove the mounted fish, they will receive nothing back.
